title: What age did Harshad Mehta become rich? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most probably He was 30+ when he established his Stock broking company and Grow More Research and AMC and Ruled the market for more than 15–17 years. He died on 31 Dec around 12:30 AM in 2001 at age of 47. Hope you got you answer please share and Upvote. Thanks ☺️
